name: Weather Forecast
info: A Stand User from another world, his Ultimate is able to deal Core Damage.

media.title: [Eng CC] PtN X JOJO | New CN A-rank Arcane | Weather Forecast Character Trailer
media.author: Jiu Jiu subs

media.title: [Eng CC] Path to Nowhere X Jojo's Bizzare Adventure: Stone Ocean | Limited Time Event PV「自由之海」
media.author: Jiu Jiu subs

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Heavy Weather
exclusiveCrimebrand.description:
New Exclusive Ultimate [Heavy Weather].
Weather Forecast creates a rainbow that makes enemies hallucinate that they have turned into a snail, stunning all enemies on field for 2 seconds, then decreasing their movement speed by (40% / 50% / 60%), lasting for (3 / 4 / 5) seconds.
[Heavy Weather] can only be used once per battle.

maniaIntensify.title: Conquer the Enemy
maniaIntensify.text: Deals 10% more Damage, and an extra 10% more for enemies with broken Cores.

shackles.title: Sudden Weather Change
shackles.description: Each Normal Attack (Stand Attack) reduces the CD of [Wind Sweep] Passive by 2 seconds.

shackles.title: Cloud Seeding
shackles.description: Passive [Weather Report] generate an additional shield to a nearest allied Sinner.

skills.name: Stand Attack
skills.description: Weather Forecast controls his Stand to attack, each hit dealing (Attack * 77%) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Poison Dart Frog Rain
skills.description: Weather Forecast orders a sweeping hurricane to drop poison dart frogs from the sky, dealing 1 Core Damage to all enemies on field, then all enemies on field will take (Attack * 22%) Magic Damage every 0.5 seconds, lasting for 4 seconds.

skills.name: Wind Pressure Sweep
skills.description: Every 8 seconds, Weather Forecast deals (Attack * 71%) Magic Damage to all enemies in the three grids in front, stacking up to 3 times, losing 1 stack after every use.

skills.name: Weather Forecast
skills.description: When the battle begins, Weather Forecast receives a (Attack * 152%) shield.

criminalRecord: A mysterious figure who resides in a secret room within the prison. The subject is taciturn and expressionless, but also calm, possessing excellent judgement and insight.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject's ability is [Weather Forecast]. The subject's ability takes form in the shape of a humanoid cloud, capable of controlling the weather from a small to large scale. On a small scale, the subject is able to generate heat via friction in the air. On a larger scale, the subject can cause localised rainfall, as well as summon indiscriminate weather attacks such as posion dart frog rain and rainstorms. Within a 1~2M range, the subject is also able to use wind pressure to deliver punches, as well as call down rain and strikes of thunder to inflict tremendous damage.
ecbFlavourText:
"You... The kind of evil that doesn't realize that it's evil..."
"Is the worst kind of evil there is!"
maniaIntensifyText: Deals X% more Damage, and an extra X% more for enemies with broken Cores.
